turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order three large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings did you want on those 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one pepperoni pizza, one chicken barbecue pizza, and one veggies lovers pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so u said 3 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 chicken bbq, and 1 veggie lovers pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that all correct so far?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct, but I want extra cheese on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 chicken bbq, and 1 veggie lovers pizza, all with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: does that sound good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, the total will be $54.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've placed your order at Bella Lunas and it should be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
